meanings.definition: To add to something that already exists.
meanings.sent1: She superadds sprinkles to her ice cream for extra sweetness.
meanings.sent2: He superadds more vegetables to his stir-fry for a healthier meal.
meanings.sent3: The chef superadds a dash of magic to his secret sauce for a special touch.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter superadds joy to every room she enters.
meanings.sent5: The artist superadds vibrant colors to his painting, making it come alive.

meanings.definition: To increase the amount or value of something by adding to it.
meanings.sent1: The bank superadds interest to your savings account over time.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise superadds strength and endurance to your body.
meanings.sent3: The magician superadds more rabbits to his hat, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness superadds warmth to every interaction she has.
meanings.sent5: The sun superadds brightness to the sky, illuminating everything below.
